New London, CT recently made the switch from council/manager to strong mayor.  If you go to www.theday.com you can track some of the issues that seem to have resulted.

text: The attached article poses some questions about the unintended consequences of switching from the council-manager to the strong mayor form of government. I would be interested to see if others agree, disagree or have a different take on the issue.
title: Unforeseen consequences of Strong Mayor
